modName: Mage Dress for UNP by Yurica
summary: a set of craftable female mage dress for UNP Base body.
descriptionHtml:
Yurica Mage Dress for UNP- Readme

Hello!

thanks Mr. Vatiwah for video:

[youtube]BTQkzx7y0EU[/youtube]

the mod adds a set of craftable female mage dress for UNP Base body.

(1) Requirements
- The shoes require HDT HighHeel System to work
- UNP Base Main Body

(2) installation:
- drop the "meshes", "textures" and yurica_magedress.esp into skyrim/data
- activate yurica_magedress.esp
- the items can be crafted under "Misc" in the tanning rack
- enjoy & please endorse if you like the dress ^_^

there might be clipping in somewhere and in some special poses.
please kindly contact me if you have any questions or needs permission.
thank you!

Changes:
14 - 7 - 2014 : Added non-HDT .esp file, please only use the main .esp or the optional one.
author: yurica
